articles.title: State opening 2 mass vaccination clinics in southern Maine as supply grows to 55000 doses this week - Press Herald
articles.description: A site at the Portland Expo and another at a former retail store in Sanford will add to a growing list of options. The Maine CDC also reported 128 new cases of COVID-19 on Monday, continuing a downward trend.
